Introducing GAget 2.0

An awesome web analytics tool for Mac

9

apr

web-development | apps
« Previous - Next »

Meet GAget - the last analytics tool you'll ever buy.

Originally a Dashboard Widget, this app has been completely redesigned to now function in the Notification Center. Unfortunately, if you're not running Yosemite 10.10, you're out of luck - that's the only version of OS X this is compatible with. At $1.99, you can't go wrong.

The original Dashboard Widget

The new Notification Center version

There's also an equally useful iPhone app. Personally, we think it might actually be better than Google's own iPhone Analytics app.

Check it out on the App Store!
